MAIN_MENU.1) VOD Recovery: Recovers M3U8 links based on stream information.
MAIN_MENU.2) Clip Recovery: Recovers all clips from past broadcasts.
MAIN_MENU.3) Download M3U8 File: Downloads a M3U8 file as an MP4 or the selected format.
MAIN_MENU.4) Unmute & Check M3U8 Availability: Check and Removesy Unavailable Segments in a M3U8 file.
MAIN_MENU.5) Set Default Video Format: Sets which video format to use for vods and clips downloaded.
MAIN_MENU.6) Set Download Directory: Sets the default location for the downloads.
MAIN_MENU.7) Help: Displays an explanation of each menu option

VOD_MODE_MENU.1) Website Video Recovery: Recovers videos by scraping websites to retrieve stream information.
VOD_MODE_MENU.2) Manual Video Recovery: Recovers videos using manual input of stream information.
VOD_MODE_MENU.4) Bulk VOD Recovery from SullyGnome CSV: Recovers all available videos based on a CSV file of streams exported from SullyGnome.

CLIP_TYPE_MENU.1) Recover All Clips from a single video: Recovers all clips from a single video.
CLIP_TYPE_MENU.2) Find Random Clips from a single video: Recovers a random set of clips from a single video.
CLIP_TYPE_MENU.3) Donwload Clip from Twitch URL: Downloads clips from a Twitch URL that are still available on Twitch.
CLIP_TYPE_MENU.4) Bulk Recover Clips from SullyGnome CS: Recovers all clips based on a CSV file of streams exported from SullyGnome.

CLIP_RECOVERY_MENU.1) Website-Based Clip Recovery: Recovers clips by scraping websites to retrieve stream data.
CLIP_RECOVERY_MENU.2) Manual Clip Recovery: Recovers clips using manual input of stream information.

BULK_CLIP_RECOVERY_MENU.1) Single CSV File: Recovers clips based on a single CSV file.
BULK_CLIP_RECOVERY_MENU.2) Multiple CSV Files: Recovers clips based on multiple CSV files.

CLIP_FORMAT_MENU.1) Default Format ([VodID]-offset-[inter: Uses the default naming format for clips. (August 2016 - Present)
CLIP_FORMAT_MENU.2) Alternate Format (vod-[VodID]-offset-: Uses an alternate naming format for clips. (Any period of time HOWEVER it uses the original VodID from Twitch)
CLIP_FORMAT_MENU.3) Legacy Format ([VodID]-index-[interva: Uses a legacy naming format for clips. (May 28th, 2016 - August 2016)

UNMUTE_AND_CHECK_M3U8_MENU.1) Check if M3U8 file is muted: Checks if the M3U8 file is muted.
UNMUTE_AND_CHECK_M3U8_MENU.2) Unmute and remove invalid segments: Unmutes the M3U8 file and removes any invalid segments.

DOWNLOAD_TYPE_MENU.3) From Twitch URL: Downloads VODs or Highlights from a Twitch URL (Only if still available on Twitch).

PLAYING_M3U8_FILE.1: Download the video file and play it with VLC or another player.
PLAYING_M3U8_FILE.2: Or Copy the M3U8 url, go to VLC -> Media -> Open Network Stream -> Paste the url and click play.
